short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove or re-add bold on Flyingstart.ca website for better studying!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Pstar study site www.flyingstart.ca is great, if only you could turn the answers off to aid in studying.. now you can!  With this plug in you can turn the bolding on / off so you can study and compare your answers to the correct ones.
